summary: Created comprehensive Figma design extraction prompts for Cursor AI. Two files created: FIGMA_DESIGN_EXTRACTION_PROMPT.md (detailed guide) and CURSOR_PROMPT_FIGMA_EXTRACTION.txt (concise prompt). The prompts include step-by-step instructions for using Figma MCP tools to extract all design specifications (colors, typography, spacing, effects) and implement them with 100% pixel-perfect accuracy using Tailwind CSS arbitrary values.
current_status: Figma extraction prompts created. Ready to use Figma MCP tools to extract complete design specifications and implement homepage with 100% accuracy. Server is running on localhost:7668 for testing.
